findings.title: Privileged Roles and Ownership
findings.description: The smart contract has owner variables or privileged roles with special privileges to make modifications to the smart contract.

findings.title: ROLE_TOKEN_CREATOR can mint arbitrary amounts of ILV to any account at any time
findings.description: The ROLE_TOKEN_CREATOR role has the ability to mint arbitrary amounts of ILV tokens to any account at any time, which is a centralization of power.
